testsuite.name: com.pokemon.backend.service.PokemonServiceTest

testcase.name: should return pokemon with description translated when habitat is cave
should return pokemon with description translated when pokemon is legendary
should return pokemon without description translated
should throw not found exception when pokemon is not found from server
